The climate is typically Mediterranean—warm, sun-drenched summers with average temperatures around 28°C, and mild winters averaging 12°C. Unlike the densely developed coastal strips, Algorfa maintains a relaxed, residential atmosphere where properties command premium pricing due to limited supply and exceptional demand from international buyers. The village centre retains authentic Spanish character while catering to its established international community, making it increasingly popular among buyers seeking quality of life and genuine investment potential.
